response.overview: In a present-day Morocco, a young couple washing their laundry. Late at night, a dirty, empty, tacky, laundromat. He is a writer, she is a singer, he is neurotic, she is the vitality, he is sad, she is free. Together, they are young, broke, artists and in love, their destiny is uncertain, heads full of dreams. Voila tells the story of two marginal over a decade, of their 20's, times full of troubles and doubts, existential crisis, difficult for them to make ends meet every month. imperfect romance although passionate.
response.title: Voila
